item.title: Jennifer Love Hewitt Teases the Jaw-Dropping Ending of the New ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’
item.description: Hewitt admits she was hesitant to return to the franchise 28 years after the original, and also weighs in on an Internet legend that the film’s iconic line was conceived by a kid visiting the set.
